locale.message: DNB Export Plugin
Export or deposit articles in DNB format.

This plugin provides the export of article metadata and full texts (in PDF and EPUB format) for their tranfer to the German National Library (DNB) using the DNB Hotfolder method. The plugin also offers the option of directly depositing the transfer package into the DNB Hotfolder.
Closed journals and journals with restricted access have to choose one of the possible access options for the archived articles at the DNB in the plugin settings below.
Note: This journal is not open access, thus you have to first chose one of the possible access options for the archived articles at DNB in the plugin settings before you can proceed with the export.

In order to deposit the articles directly from within OJS, you will need to enter your DNB Hotfolder username, password and subfolder in the plugin settings below. If you do not enter these credentials, you can still export the DNB packages.
You can configure the DNB export plugin here.
ISSN (s. Setup 1) is required for export and deposit.
TAR command (s. cli part in the config.inc.php) is required for export and deposit.
Please configure the DNBExport plugin:
Access to the articles in the DNB archive

For open access journals and articles the access to the archived version will automatically be unrestricted for all (second option). Closed and journals with restricted access will have to chose one of these options that DNB provides for access of the archived articles.
Restricted access (access only on specially configured computers in the DNB reading rooms).
Unrestricted access for all.
Access only for users registered with the DNB, also from outside the DNB.
Please define the access permissions for the archived articles.
Subfolder ID
This is the subfolder in your DNB Hotfolder, where the exported packages should be uploaded.
Username
Please enter the username you got from DNB.
Please enter the password you got from DNB.
Please note that the password will be saved as plain text, i.e. not encrypted.
Deposit articles to DNB automatically

OJS will deposit articles automatically to DNB as articles are published. Please note that this may take a short amount of time after publication to process. You can check for all not deposited articles in the articles listing.
